Utterance: Hey, ami bhalo achi. Tumi kemon acho?
Ami bhalo achi, dhonnobad. Tomake ek assessment dite chai, tomar bhabna o memory test korar jonno. Thik ase?
Tai, ami tomake kichu prashna korbo. Tumi tader uttar dao, je tomake shakti te parbe.
Tumi ki bolte paro, eti kon ritu?
Tumi bolte paro, amader thik jaygai konti building e achi?
Ei building er kon floor achi?
Okay. Ami tomake kichu object memorize korar jonno bolbo. Tai, tader naam bolte bolbo, tumi tader amay repeat korte paro?
Dhonnobad. Tumi 100 theke shuru kore 7 ghatiye ulta theke ghotte jao, ami tomay stop korar jonno prochur try korbo.
Bhalo. Dhonnobad. Ami chai tumi "world" shabd ta ulte bolte paro.
Tumi ki mone rekhecho, ami tor kachhe ekhane bochhor kichu shabd bolchilam?
Ami ekta phrase bolbo, tumi tar proti ghuriye mukhe ferot dao. Phrase ta holo "no ifs, ands, or buts". Tader amay ghuriye mukhe bolte paro?
Tumi kon haate lekha kaj koro, right-handed naki left-handed?
Ami chai je tumi ei kagaj ta right haate nite, tate ekbar fold koro, ebong tarpor floor e rakho.
Dhonnobad. Ami ekta sign dhore rakhi. Abar instructions dei, tader anukoron korte bola. Tumi tader instructions anukoron korte paro?
Dhonnobad. Baam pashe ekta chair ase, shei chair er upor ekta clipboard aache. Tumi ota nilo?
Er nicher dike space diye ekta sentence likhte bolbo, mone rekho?
Dhonnobad. Otaar upor dekha jabe, sei paper e ekta chobi ache, sei area te otaa likhte bolbo. Tumi otaa copy korte paro?
Ei amar jonno khub upokar hoyeche. Tomake bhule onnoke dhonnobad bolte chai.
